author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-1488 Setting a static configuration binding must
also set the "staticallyBound" flag according to the
new binding: true if bound, false if unbound

author: stefan
msg: do not log error when legitimitly throwing UnsupportedRepositoryException.
changed log entry to debug level

author: dbaum
msg: use session.err rather than System.err to write message added in FELIX-1405.
